title: Golden Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Nabisco went bonkers and made a Golden Oreo. Here's the review.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Check out the Oreo Oration playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&feature=plcp

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up everybody Welcome to Oreo oration I'm Greg Miller and while you were out living your life and buying a car or whatever the hell it is you do the fine people at Oreo were making endless variations to milk's favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video then subscribe to my channel here today we're reviewing golden Oreo now here's the thing you you know you out there you think you know everything about Oreos you probably seen the golden Oreo right this was the big deal this is when the people at Oreo said we are bunkers and we're going to change everything you know about Oreo and put them out there so we begin this Oreo oration like we do every Oreo oration with the first look peeling back Nabisco patented seal technology there we go oh look at them they see I'm not getting shorted any cookies I'm not getting any broken cookies let's get the bouquet in here oh a

first look peeling back Nabisco patented seal technology there we go oh look at them they see I'm not getting shorted any cookies I'm not getting any broken cookies let's get the bouquet in here oh a very interesting smell it's not the cream speaking to me this time when I put my nose right in there this time I'm getting the smell of the actual shortbread cookie of course the the white cookie if you will so let's see here up next of course in oration uh The Taste how are these little how are these little yellow guys going to taste let's see okay Dynamite taste put it up dynamite they've got this light sugary kind of vibe to them they're not sugar cookies but that's kind of the taste you get with it mixes really well with the cream of course that's a huge part a big part of or is though is pairing it with milk let's see how these boys play with the milk today look at that so so beautiful uhoh everybody it's white on white crime just kidding don't worry all right so we're dunking how

is pairing it with milk let's see how these boys play with the milk today look at that so so beautiful uhoh everybody it's white on white crime just kidding don't worry all right so we're dunking how the cookie you know the white cookie how is it going to take we always talk about how important it is that the black cookie takes on that milk sucks it in nice and tight gives us a good taste let's see what we get here M now we're into interesting City here's my thing thing right away with how it pairs with milk taste wise an excellent taste they're mixing really well together the shortbread sugar cookie taste the white cream however I dunk that the you know traditional three or four times that we do hear on Oreo oration the cookie itself did not get softer you know you you dunk the traditional chocolate cookie takes on a lot of that milk it's kind of soggy you like that it's a little bit different here it just tasted like an Oreo with a little bit of milk on it you can get probably the

chocolate cookie takes on a lot of that milk it's kind of soggy you like that it's a little bit different here it just tasted like an Oreo with a little bit of milk on it you can get probably the same sensation by eating an Oreo drinking some milk can't give them a lot of good points for that that's that's no good let's see how they twist of course making double stuff's a big deal ah no golden cookie you were doing so well you can't twist I'll give you another shot I do I do this if we got to do best two out of three we'll give you the chance here on Oreo oration another one splits off again of course if you have a butter knife or your teeth you can fix it yourself but who wants to do that when you could just perfectly split them put them back together so reviewing the golden AA I was saying you were doing very well you were charting to be a solid 9.0 9.0 9.0 what's that that's nothing I blame the golden cookie I'm gonna have to give him an 85 here again Dynamite Choice really good

you were doing very well you were charting to be a solid 9.0 9.0 9.0 what's that that's nothing I blame the golden cookie I'm gonna have to give him an 85 here again Dynamite Choice really good tasting obviously we've looked at some problems doesn't pair that well with milk doesn't twist that well so that's the way the cookie crumbles for the golden Oreo what do you think you probably had this one leave a video response Below on this video letting me know you're a review for the Oreo then subscribe to my channel then like the video now most importantly ladies and gentlemen are there Oreos out there that I'm missing I'm sure there are name them in the comments below so I can go to stores and buy them with my own money cuz I get none of this for free then share this video with your friends so I continue to make videos I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of cookies to review but until then keep on dunking
